symptoms.name: Pain
symptoms.severity: Variable, can be absent or present
symptoms.pattern: May develop later in the course of the disease

symptoms.name: Purulent discharge
symptoms.pattern: May be present in some cases

symptoms.name: Crusting
symptoms.pattern: May be present on the surface of the nodules

physical_findings: Purulent material on incision (in some cases)
Multiple pustules and nodules (in some cases)

imaging_findings.X-ray: Well-circumscribed soft tissue nodule in the subcutaneous plane

required: Histopathological examination showing pigmented, septate hyphae, often with constrictions at septations (bamboo stem appearance)
Granulomatous reaction with foreign-body giant cells, epithelioid cells, and xanthoma cells
supportive: Clinical presentation of a subcutaneous cyst or abscess
Culture of the fungus (though often not possible due to formalin fixation)
